A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If not one of the worst movies I've ever watched\, this is definitely the worst Star Wars. There's no mystery\, no fear\, no soul - it feels like a bunch of weird scenes just thrown together. The writing is immature\, corny\, confusing and boring. The villains aren't intimidating\, the heroes aren't inspiring. It's shot and edited very strangely. There are too many moments which lack context\, explanation or reason to mention. I'm no massive SW fan\, but this movie missed the mark in so many ways I'm amazed it made it out of the editing room and onto the big screen.
